metadata.description: Complex multi-hop questions for OPERA system input

corporate_chain.question: What is the stock symbol of the parent company of the brand that makes the Galaxy smartphone?
In what year was the company founded that now owns the luxury brand that makes the Phantom automobile?
What is the nationality of the current CEO of the company that acquired Whole Foods?

geographic_chain.question: What is the official language of the country where the city that hosts the headquarters of CERN is located?
What is the population density of the state where the university that developed ARPANET is located?
What ocean borders the country where the company that created Pokemon is headquartered?

temporal_chain.question: Who was the president of the United States when the company that created the iPhone was founded?
What was the world population when the inventor of the World Wide Web was born?
How old was the founder of Facebook when Twitter was launched?

scientific_chain.question: What is the atomic number of the element named after the scientist who developed the theory of relativity?
In what country was the scientist born who discovered the vaccine for the disease that caused the 1918 pandemic?
What university did the person attend who proved Fermat's Last Theorem?

cultural_chain.question: What is the native language of the director who made the first film to win Best Picture at the Oscars?
In what city is the museum located that houses the painting that Leonardo da Vinci is most famous for?
What instrument did the composer primarily play who wrote the national anthem of Germany?

mixed_domain.question: What is the GDP per capita of the country where the athlete who broke the 4-minute mile barrier was born?
How many employees does the company have that owns the search engine used by the browser that comes pre-installed on Mac computers?
What year was the peace treaty signed that ended the war in which the grandfather of Queen Elizabeth II was the monarch?
